title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Will long-lasting HIV preventive be a game changer—or a missed opportunity?
items.description: FDA’s approval of lenacapavir comes at a time when global health cuts could stall its rollout

items.title: Breaking: Trump administration lifts freeze on NIH funding to Columbia University
items.description: Internal email leaves unclear whether $250 million in terminated grants will be reinstated

items.title: ‘Dragon Man’ skull belongs to mysterious human relative
items.description: At long last, scientists have a nearly complete cranium from hominins known as Denisovans

items.title: U.S. National Academies adopts new business model to weather a financial storm
items.description: Realignment of major program units aims to improve efficiency and make up for loss of federal contracts

items.title: This moth makes its epic migration navigating by starlight
items.description: Bogong moths fly 1000 kilometers orienting to stars and the Milky Way, an ability never seen before in invertebrates

items.title: Funding cuts to U.S. archaeology could imperil field’s future
items.description: A <cite>Science</cite> analysis of canceled and curtailed federal grants reveals hits to research, collections, and training

items.title: Iranian missile strike devastates two buildings at Israel’s Weizmann Institute
items.description: Hundreds of scientists have lost labs, equipment, and specimens

items.title: Sharks may use an unexpected organ to fight microbial invaders
items.description: The pancreas, which helps control blood sugar in humans, may be critical part of shark immune system

items.title: U.S. researchers are speaking up for science in local newspapers
items.description: Through two grassroots efforts, more than 80 op eds have been published in news outlets across the country

items.title: ‘Truly amazing’: Octopuses ‘taste’ harmful microbes with their suckers
items.description: Unique ability allows the animals to protect themselves and their offspring from decaying food and other material
